website_summaries.verdict: While not the most durable option, this steamer and strainer is inexpensive and easy to use.
pros: Can be used with a pressure cooker or any pot that is eight inches in diameter or greater
Nine inches total diameter when opened, with one-inch legs
Center ring for safely lifting it out of pots
cons: Some reports of rusting after a few months or falling apart

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this.
customer_reviews.text: Began to rust after a few months. I would not recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality in comparison to the Pyrex brand I had ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made, do not think this is quality stainless steel. The leafs of the steamer were sticking together and not opening smoothly. Poor quality in comparison to the Pyrex brand I had for 15 years. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Aluminum parts.
customer_reviews.text: Steamer has Aluminum Legs/Standoffs and Center retrieval Post. After 2 uses the Aluminum began to degrade and became corroded. I drilled out and changed to Stainless hardware.
customer_reviews.author: chris mcatee

customer_reviews.title: This is the steamer basket you need
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. I will mostly use it in an(which I really like), so I need to be able to remove the feet and use the Instant Pot trivet for the bottom support. At the same time as I bought this steamer, I also bought the. The Timmy steamer is much flimsier and cheap (although it costs the same as this TOPOKO steamer). I returned the Timmy and will happily keep this one instead. Although I expect to use this mostly in the Instant Pot, it also fits nicely in a large pot on the stovetop, since it is fully adjustable. Buy this, you won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my needs: I had read about the science of making hard-boiled eggs: steam them, don't boil them!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit for 6 qt instant pot
customer_reviews.text: Fit the instant pot perfectly (6 qt) If you use it to boil eggs, you need to be prepared for the fact that they are going to roll out when you lift this out of the pot so better to just remove the eggs individually. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: rulrich

customer_reviews.title: Steaming again at last.
customer_reviews.text: Its amazing that you can't find these little items for the kitchen in major department stores. I have been looking for a steamer basket for a while now and couldn't find one. I found this steamer on Amazon and love it. In a week , I have steamed fresh califlower and fresh fish. It worked great and cleaned up great. So glad I found this steamer. It fits in a drawer for easy storage. I would recommend this to anyone that is looking for a steamer.
customer_reviews.author: kelley kingman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value - Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: The vegetable steamer basket is so easy to use and fits great in a regular stove top pan too. It's easy to clean and we are extremely satisfied with this purchase. We use our steamer daily and appreciate the efficient design. it was easy to order and arrived promptly and in perfect condition. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good size, Sturdy, Durable
customer_reviews.text: As vegetarians, we do a lot of steaming our veggies and some family members are somewhat persnickety about their veggies touching another! One solution we found is to use a very large stockpot, a few to several sized steam baskets individually holding our separated veggies and for our needs, the outcome is superb and pleasant around the table. This basket held 3 large artichokes easily and sturdily, we are pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Geely

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it.
customer_reviews.text: The screw on handle in the middle would not screw into the hole. I'm guessing the threads were stripped or not even there. It's going in the recycle bin and I bought a sturdy one from another company.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for my Instant Pot
customer_reviews.text: This vegetable steamer is a perfect fit for my Instant Pot. I use it for pressure cooking hard boiled eggs, vegetables, and roasts. Makes for easy clean up, with no food sticking to the bottom of the pot. Also, the food cooks perfectly.The steamer basket is also easy to clean and stores right in the IP.
customer_reviews.author: S. E. Regan

customer_reviews.title: some parts are not because they were staining and rusting like the hook on
customer_reviews.text: I own several of these in the past, but I think this model is not all stainless steel, some parts are not because they were staining and rusting like the hook on top
customer_reviews.author: Deco Diver

customer_reviews.title: Wrong material used
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, however, the legs and the fitting for the removable handle is made out of a soft aluminum and is already corroding. Would have been nice if it were stainless. Would easily have paid more if they had used stainless. This item has to be cleaned with a brush so it takes some. Received it promptly, so thanks Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Senior Chris

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I cannot recommend this product. I bought this to steam fruits and veg for my daughter. One of the spokes broke the third time I used it. Really bad quality and the prongs are not as tight as they initially were. I am also now reading the other reviews that the product rusts easily ( hasn’t happened yet as I stopped using after the third attempt).
customer_reviews.author: Shivaranjani

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted (a simple steamer with middle handle removable so could use for big things like artichoke or steam fish without cutting up) but still use if want to have handle for small vegetables and pull out of pan without burning myself.
customer_reviews.author: frances R. Horton

customer_reviews.title: excellent steamer
customer_reviews.text: very nice ss steamer, solid heavier weight than my previous model, and I really like the removable center post/lift mechanism. appears very well made, time will tell. delivered quickly and in perfect new condition in original box.
customer_reviews.author: alison

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I bouth this after my boys decided my other one was a toy. The older one, they were able to remove some of the foldable sides. So far they haven't done this with this one yet, but I am also keeping it away. The one thing to note was it was larger than my last which makes it not fit as well in my pants. Make sure to check the eight size for your pants before buying. I can still make it work, just takes more effort and I cant get a good seal on 1 of my pans
customer_reviews.author: KevinandStacy

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, should be durable with gentle use.
customer_reviews.text: The steamer basket was just as I had expected! I love it! It looks lightweight, but I think it will be durable; will make sure to handle it gently. I've used it twice, no problems with use & no discoloration noted. I wash it by hand, to clean all of the flaps & holes. I store it in the same box it comes in to protect the flaps from getting caught on something.
customer_reviews.author: Karberr

customer_reviews.title: Works great, decent quality, affordable veggie steamer...
customer_reviews.text: IT IS AMAZING, UNBELIEVABLE, THE BEST EVER, er, vegetable steamer. Sorry, cooking veggies is just so exciting! Anyway, this does what it is supposed to do, with minimal fuss and no binding. The old one bound up like a pair of wool briefs under yoga pants. No fun. This one is great at what it does.
customer_reviews.author: BearTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great, sturdy steamer basket!
customer_reviews.text: Had one of these YEARS ago and loved it but I ended up giving it away. Now want to cook hard boiled eggs (read steamed eggs peel easily) so bought this one. Like it folds easily for storage and non rusting metal. So glad I found it.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Gal

customer_reviews.title: Bought it to use in my InstantPot
customer_reviews.text: Works great in a pressure cooker or InstantPot to keep vegs out of the broth so all the vegs don't taste like the broth . Just put vegs in it then put it "on top" of the roast or other meat. Also works great to steam cook vegs . Excellent quality, price, and fast shipping . EXCELLENT SELLER
customer_reviews.author: EmptyPockets

customer_reviews.title: All-metal, no plastic or silicone
customer_reviews.text: Unlike most steamer baskets on Amazon, this product is made entirely of metal. I previously ordered another basket only to find out the basket's legs had a silicone or rubber casing over them. It's probably not a big deal, but I would rather not have any type of rubber/plastic immersed in boiling water below the food I'm cooking/eating.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: Makes cooking vegetables easy
customer_reviews.text: This steamer basket fits into all my pots and is an excellent way to cook vegetables without losing their nutritional value. The basket is sturdy and easy to clean. The only quibble I have is that it is a bit difficult to extract the hot basket from the pot. I have found kitchen tongs useful for this.
customer_reviews.author: Carole Barkley

customer_reviews.title: It is very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about it. I have previously purchased those flimsy baskets at the store and have not had any that last longer than a week. This one is so much better
customer_reviews.author: Baker lady

customer_reviews.title: Middle grasp ring broke off after one use.
customer_reviews.text: Very poorly made or defective because after one use for a small batch of broccoli the middle screw and ring completely broke off and is impossible to fix. I can still steam my vegetables but I can't pull the basket out.
customer_reviews.author: Jay L

customer_reviews.title: Love this steamer!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the stainless steel, love the collapsibility, goes through the dishwasher with no problems, it opens wide enough for my 5 and 6 quart pans.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Look no further for a Steamer
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, easy to clean, and a great size. We have put this thing through the dishwasher numerous times now and it is still holding up great. Would highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: This replaced one I had that had broken.

This colander looks great and it arrived in lightening "Prime" time, which for these days, is a nice surprise, given the coronavirus chaos. Very happy with my purchase. Might get one for our vacation home.

product_meta.title: TOPOKO Vegetable Steamer Basket, Fits Instant Pot Pressure Cooker 5/6 QT and 8 QT, 18/8 Stainless Steel, Folding Steamer Insert For Veggie Fish Seafood Cooking, Expandable to Fit Various Size Pot
product_meta.description:
Perfect combination 

Stainless steel metal basket comes complete as a steamer and strainer. 

Already assembled one piece combination. Collapsible - It goes from small to large 9” in a snap when petals are opened and comes with a convenient handle inside. 

Easy to Use - Frozen bags: single or mixed vegetables. - Raw: Corn, broccoli, cauliflower, or carrots - Try fish: cod, salmon, talapia, etc. Easy lift with 2” handle and o-ring to strain excess water and non-extendable to avoid spring malfunctioning injuries Have you been searching, how to use a vegetable steamer or vegetable steamer instructions ? If so, I have a few tips that will help you use the TOPOKO steamer. 1st - Wash before use! 

2nd - Open the steamer and place raw or frozen vegetables inside. 

3rd - Close the steamer and place in a pan or pot with just enough water to fill to where the base of the steamer is above the water level. 

4th - Cover for a few minutes, timing is dependent on what you’re cooking, how much, and frozen or raw. Raw thin vegetables will definitely cook faster. Use a fork to check for tenderness. 

5th - Use handle to lift and strain excess water while removing, season, and enjoy. 

Make sure you don’t boil dry. You can listen for when the water has evaporated. If you’re making baby food, you would transition your soft vegetables to some type of blender, where they could be quickly mashed for baby food. You can also manually mash them since they will be soft and tender. Clean up is a breeze. Although dishwasher safe, to preserve the quality of the steamer, it is best to hand wash and air or towel dry before storage. The compact design allows for easy storage without taking up tons of space. Gift Perfect wedding present, showers, housewarming, or a cook enthusiast. Buy Now or Add to Registry
feature_bullets: AMAZINGLY DESIGN - constructed from 18/8 food grade stainless steel, absolutely safe to ensure you are not leaking toxic substance into your food, the best choice for your health.

PERFECT FIT FOR INSTANT POT - Expands to fit pots and pans of sizes in 6 QT and up, they also ready to collapse in half their original size when you want to put away, then they are easy package and take up no room at all.
EASY CLEAN UP - Extremely friendly to any kinds of dishwasher.
EASY IN USE - Prepare a meal just in one pot, from vegetables to seafood, egg, crab and much more.
DIMENSION - Diameter 6 inch to 10.4 inch, height range ( leg included) 3 inch.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars748 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
